content: MT-C-T 3D/2/HL OC transversal connector 3D connector for assembling rigid strut channel structures for outdoor use with low pollution ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Easy to install – compatible with the Hilti MT Twist-Lock and hexagon bolts Provides rigidity to free standing structures Allows bracing to be removed Applications Installing ventilation equipment, ducts, pipework and cable trays on flat roofs Suitable for use in outdoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q235 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q235 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Material thickness | 4 mm | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2320181 - Connector MT-C-T 3D/2/HL OC transversal - Package Size 8 pc
